name: The Lizards
description: Ink on reclaimed accounts book. I made this one some years ago in response to the gentrification and marginalisation of the creative communities in my hometown. You’ve probably heard a similar story elsewhere. The only other thing that bothered me was the fact that my red and green inks were not bright enough, well, maybe that and a notorious incident which took place in a cafe one evening. Anyway now I’ve edited it so y’all can finally enjoy it with proper coloured monopoly buildings. Peace.
